page.title: 08Castle Camps Primary school.
page.content: Our school was built about 120 years ago, with some rooms built about 25 years ago.There are 86 children in school at present.We have a heated swimming pool and a playing field.We also have some playing apparatus. The old school house has just been bought. The school has just got two mobile classrooms, because the school has become very crowded. Children from Horseheath now attend, as the school there closed last year. The school Hall will now not house a class, as it has always done in the past. This term there have been two classes in the Hall! There are four teachers, including the Head,Mr.Scull. A secretary and two General assistants complete the staff. There is lots of equipment in school, including two computers.It is a happy place.
